main.name: Meraki Home Designs
main.description: Specializing in custom interior design, our studio serves the Nova Scotia community with unique boutique homes to fit any style or budget
main.bioLineOne: Iris Chanterelle is the founder of Meraki Home Design Studio. Born in Victoria, B.C. she now resides in Nova Scotia with her two children and loyal studio dog, Cookie. Inspired by nature and renaissance era architecture, Irisâ€™ style imbues a simple; yet regal, old world charm, and her bespoke home designs and vignettes are truly one of a kind.
main.bioLineTwo: As an artist, I aspire to cultivate harmonious interaction between whimsical rustic charm and modern convenience. My unique design concepts include sourcing, restoring, and integrating reclaimed architectural elements, and I work closely with local craftsmen and artisans to bring a vision to life. I am self-taught, inspired by people I've met, places I've been, an incessant need to forage; and quite simply, a love of beauty.

ethos.text: Seek patience and passion in equal amounts. Patience alone will not build the temple. Passion alone will destroy its walls.
If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
Architecture is not based on concrete and steel, and the elements of the soil. It's based on wonder.
Great buildings that move the spirit have always been rare. In every case they are unique, poetic, products of the heart.
